channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: You can’t go wrong with these 6 Garmin Black Friday deals – trust me, I’ve tested them all
item.description: Looking for a Black Friday Garmin deal? I'm a Garmin expert – the six best watches are all cheaper today.

item.title: The 100 best Black Friday deals under $100 – AirPods, TVs, Kindle, Fitbit, and more
item.description: I've found today's 100 best Black Friday deals under $100 that are actually worth buying, featuring AirPods, TVs, Kindle, Lego, Air fryers, and more.

item.title: Supabase hit $5B by turning down million-dollar contracts. Here’s why.
item.description: Vibe coding has taken the tech industry by storm, and it’s not just the Lovables and Replits of the world that are winning. The startups building the infrastructure behind them are cashing in too. Supabase, the open-source database platform that’s become the backend of choice for the vibe-coding world, raised $100 million at a $5 billion valuation just months after closing $200 million at $2 billion. But co-founder and CEO […]...

item.title: Black Friday deals that are most popular with Verge readers
item.description: It may not surprise anyone who is tech-aware that publications such as The Verge track the affiliate links that their readers click — in fact, every article that links to a vendor has this statement on top: “If you buy something from a Verge link, Vox Media may earn a commission.” So we will be totally honest […]

item.title: Infosys co-founder once again calls for longer than 70-hour weeks - and no, he's not joking
item.description: Infosys co-founder Narayana Murthy advocates 72-hour work weeks, despite global studies showing shorter schedules improve productivity and employee wellbeing.

item.title: The 32 best Black Friday Apple deals to grab before they're gone - iPhone 17, AirPods, MacBooks, and more
item.description: I’m an Apple fan and these are the best Black Friday deals you simply can’t miss.

item.title: Black Friday : suivez en direct les meilleures offres du week-end (Amazon, Fnac, Darty…)
item.description: Le vendredi est passé, la poussière est retombée. Mais le Black Friday ? Il est loin d'être terminé. Amazon, Fnac, Darty et les autres jouent les prolongations tout le week-end. On reprend le direct pour vous dénicher les derniers stocks et les offres oubliées.

item.title: This affordable but effective smart air purifier is even cheaper for Black Friday
item.description: Pick up this well-performing air purifier for less with this Black Friday deal at Amazon.

item.title: Save $200 on the best Android phone with this Black Friday OnePlus 13 deal
item.description: The OnePlus 13 is down to just $699 this Black Friday, and as well as being the best Android phone you can buy, it’s one of the best Black Friday deals you can buy.

item.title: ‘Angel’s Egg’ Still Embodies Anime’s Wonderous Ability to Move Without Words
item.description: Mamoru Oshii’s cult classic original video anime, a haunting, wordless vision, returns to theaters in 4K for its 40th anniversary.

item.title: You can get a four-pack of AirTags for just over $60, the lowest price ever
item.description: Traveling can be chaotic, especially during the holidays. If you’re planning to hit the road before the end of the year, Apple’s AirTag makes for an excellent travel companion. Right now, you can pick up a four-pack of AirTags for an all-time low of $62.99 (about $36 off) at Amazon, Walmart, and Best Buy. You […]

item.title: ChatGPT turns 3 on Sunday – here's how far it’s really come and where it’s heading next
item.description: Three years after launch, ChatGPT has quietly transformed from a fun experiment into a powerful, multimodal AI assistant – without becoming the AGI some predicted.

item.title: 20 Best Black Friday Deals at Best Buy (2025) on Hot Tech
item.description: Best Buy is rolling out really great deals on some of our favorite tech that we've tested this year.

item.title: TCL and Hisense TVs are the stars of Black Friday, and they're getting incredible discounts alongside these other brilliant mini-LED sets
item.description: Some of 2025's top TVs are mini-LED TVs. They define value for money, and are getting awesome deals for Black Friday.

item.title: VPN support lands on next-gen Amazon Fire TV Sticks – but only two VPNs are ready
item.description: The Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K Select finally got the needed update to support VPN apps. Only NordVPN and IPVanish are ready – and they are both on sale.

item.title: Ne payez plus le stockage Apple : ce dock Ugreen transforme votre Mac Mini M4
item.description: Vous avez acheté le nouveau Mac mini M4 et vous avez réalisé deux choses : les ports sont derrière et le stockage coûte un rein. Ugreen a la solution. Leur station d'accueil 11-en-1, qui fait aussi boîtier pour disque dur externe, passe à 64,99 €. C'est l'outil parfait pour "hacker" la politique tarifaire d'Apple.

item.title: The Garmin Forerunner 55 is selling out, but it's cheaper than ever at Boots
item.description: This cheap Garmin Forerunner is seeing a last-minute price crash, and I'd recommend you get it.

item.title: All the best Black Friday VPN deals LIVE: reviewed by our VPN experts
item.description: It's Black Friday! All afternoon I'll be bringing you live updates, exclusive insights and the very best Black Friday VPN deals.

item.title: 160+ Amazon Black Friday deals: Find record-low prices on AirPods, Kindles, Lego, and LG TVs
item.description: Amazon Black Friday 2025 is officially here, and you can buy Fire TVs starting at $99. Shop record prices on Kindle, Bose, Lego, and Apple products.

item.title: 130+ best Black Friday deals: We found record prices on Apple Watches, OLED TVs, Legos, and Kindles
item.description: See the top Black Friday deals on Apple products, Dyson vacuums, Sony headphones, and Legos. Save $250 on MacBooks, 27% on Kindles, and 55% on Amazon devices.

item.title: The 174 best Black Friday deals we’ve found so far — a ton of tech is over half off
item.description: Now that the Thanksgiving dishes are put away and the last slice of pie is hidden in the back of the fridge, it’s time to turn your attention to the next major holiday: Black Friday. The biggest shopping day of the year has started, and as expected, there are tens of thousands of deals staring […]

item.title: L’iPhone 16 Pro Max est bradé pour le Black Friday
item.description: C'est l'offre que personne n'attendait sur un produit sorti il y a un an. Le tout-puissant iPhone 16 Pro Max tombe à 1 099 € chez Darty avec le code BF30. Ajoutez à cela 90 € crédités sur votre compte fidélité, et vous tenez le deal Apple du Black Friday.
